text: Since I am blind, I cannot see a person's face, and I must judge his character by the sound of his voice. Generally, when I hear someone congratulating another person on their happiness or success, I also hear a secret tone of envy. When sympathy is expressed for another's misfortune, I feel pleasure and satisfaction, as if the one who is sympathy is actually happy because there is something left for him to take advantage of. FIN
title: Felicitaciones y condolencias
author: nan Anónimo
